item.title: Blog Setup Completed Finally
item.description: The only thing left with the blog was to add a commenting system. Hugo’s default is Disqus, but I didn’t want that for the usual reasons of lack-of-privacy and bloat. After searching around, I looked at isso and commento. Commento needs Postgres whereas isso uses the much lighter SQLite. Since I get only a few comments, it’s isso first up.
